DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy of the new RJ4 compare with the standard RJ3 biopsy forceps for performing polypectomy for small colorectal polyps.
DOC.brief_title: Comparison of Two Types of Biopsy Forceps for Obtaining Cold Biopsy Polypectomy for Small Sessile Colorectal Polyps Less Than 6 mm in Diameter
DOC.criteria: colon polyps less than 6 mm no colon polyps
DOC.keyword: evaluate the effectiveness of one bite polypectomy with the RJ3 biopsy forcep versus the RJ4 biopsy forcep
